title: No one Should Have to Suffer Like I have this Week (Please Read)
body:
Riot I have experienced the most hellish of weeks playing league of legends (Yes Even worse than Having a full team of Feeders and Trolls in Elo Hell). What's so bad you may ask? Well After constant crashes trying to load into a game, I have been greeted with Leaver Buster after Leaver Buster. I have had to sit through 25 leaver busters this whole week. I reported this as a bug but honestly i don't really know what the problem is (I play on a low spec computer using Low Spec Mode, doesn't do much by the way). One Instance I got disconnected due to a crash error, so I tried to log in and got the crash again. Confused I tried to get back in one more time and guess what? IT CRASHED YET AGAIN! Please fix this and fix low spec mode because honestly not a single player should have to go through what I experienced this week. I'm not asking for any kind of apology gift or anything (I wouldn't mind though). I just want to get awareness out for us low spec users and to avoid any problems like this in the future. Thank you for reading this.

  {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
Oh man.....I honestly don't know which sounds worse to me xD.

Jokes aside, low spec mode was a good first step but it sounds like this issue might possibly be stemming from some kind of damaged or corrupted game files. Let's take some time to go through this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) as a first step. Test those changes in a custom or practice game, but hit me back up if you still can't get back on the Rift.
